latex:
Let $ n$ denote the smallest positive integer that is divisible by both $ 4$ and $ 9$, and whose base-$ 10$ representation consists of only $ 4$'s and $ 9$'s, with at least one of each. What are the last four digits of $ n$?\\
\\
$ \textbf{(A)}\ 4444\qquad 
\textbf{(B)}\ 4494\qquad 
\textbf{(C)}\ 4944\qquad 
\textbf{(D)}\ 9444\qquad 
\textbf{(E)}\ 9944$
